name: FROGERIM
description:
(Currently Testing - Expect updates until jam ends)

A short adventure game made for Mini Jam 79

Created Solo in <72 hours.

Controls:

WASD: move

Shift: Sprint

Mouse X: Orbit

Scrollwheel: Zoom

E: Interact

X: Close Book

R: Restart (for any soft locks I missed)

Esc: Main Menu

Disclaimer: There are probably ways to cheese the game and/or get out of bounds. This is not an open world game, so wandering off and jumping over large hills probably means you are in the wrong place.
